column1: '''Ghosts''' was a name commonly used to describe the [[undead]]
column2: beings which did not perish after what would be a natural death
column3: but which continued to haunt the living in their after-life. While likely often the product of a vivid imagination
column4: the dealings of the [[Fellowship of the Ring]] with several types of undead testify that ghosts were a reality in [[Middle-earth]].<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
